thread.title: 5 O'Clock Somewhere: The Best Little Ram Shed In The Karoo
thread.title_full: 5 O'Clock Somewhere: The Best Little Ram Shed In The Karoo

author: Alexandra Ma
title: 5 O'Clock Somewhere: The Best Little Ram Shed In The Karoo
text:
5 O'Clock Somewhere: The Best Little Ram Shed In The Karoo Roads & Kingdoms Posted: 10/20/2015 04:10 PM EDT | Edited: 43 minutes ago Roads & Kingdoms 
Even in the middle of hunting season, you’ll want to go easy on the shooters in the Ramstal Bar on the outskirts of Nieu-Bethesda village, deep in the Sneeuberg Mountains of South Africa’s Karoo region.
